Package ooga.model.game_components

Class GamePiece

java.lang.Object
ooga.model.game_components.GamePiece
public class GamePiece
extends java.lang.Object
Represents a generic game piece. Has a location, the board it is on, and a list of possible moves

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    GamePiece​(Coordinate coordinates)
    Constructor that takes the coordinates, because every piece needs it's coordinates to know how it can move

  • Method Details

    • setPossibleMoves

      public void setPossibleMoves​(java.util.List<PieceMovement> allPossibleMoves)
      Sets the piece's possible moves
      Parameters:
      allPossibleMoves - A list of PieceMovement objects that represent the possible moves

    • getAllLegalMoves

      public java.util.List<Coordinate> getAllLegalMoves()
      Gets a list of all the coordinates that represent legal moves. Also creates the legalMovementMap used to retrieve the correct movement object when a set of coordinates is used to move a piece
      Returns:
      A list of the coordinates of the legal moves

    • setDummyBoard

      public void setDummyBoard​(GamePiece[][] dummyBoard)
      Used for testing, sets a dummy board
      Parameters:
      dummyBoard - The dummy board

    • setPieceTeam

      public void setPieceTeam​(java.lang.String team)
      Sets the team that a piece is a part of
      Parameters:
      team - The name of the team (or name of the player)

    • getPieceTeam

      public java.lang.String getPieceTeam()
      Gets the team that a piece is a part of
      Returns:
      the name of the team (or name of the player)
